author: Dr15Jones
body:
The module HLTDummyCollections is the last module to produce LazyGetter
objects. The SiStrip case was changed to match the modern class type
used. the ECal was commented out since it is unclear what is the proper
replacement since the module label that was used by the HLTDummyCollections
when delivering ECal hits is no longer associated to an existing module
type.
title: Removed old LazyGetter calls from HLTDummyCollections
